item.title: First script-->well procedure: MoveMouseBy
item.dc:creator: @iloveit8 iloveit8
item.description:
@iloveit8 wrote:

Dont know if it exists yet… but i thought it might be usefull sometime, somewhere, somehow .

procedure MoveMouseBy(ByX : integer; ByY : integer; Mistake : boolean);

var CurrentX, CurrentY, EndX, EndY : integer;

begin
GetMousePos(CurrentX, CurrentY);
If Mistake = true
  then EndX := CurrentX + ByX - 15 + random(30)
   else EndX := CurrentX + ByX;
if Mistake = true
 then EndY := CurrentY + ByY - 15 + random(30)
  else EndY := CurrentY + ByY;
movemousesmooth(Endx, Endy);
end;

If someone has any tips it would be nice to place it [size=20pt]HERE[/size], thank you.

Read full topic
